title: Music App
about: A sleek and responsive music player app to play, pause, skip songs, and manage playlists with a clean UI and smooth controls.
features: 🎵 Play & Pause controls for seamless playback.
⏮️⏭️ Skip to Previous or Next song.
🔁 Support for Repeat All, Repeat One, and Shuffle modes.
🎤 Voice search to instantly find your favorite tracks.
❤️ Mark songs as Favorite and access them easily.
📃 Create, manage, and delete custom Playlists.
➕ Add or remove songs from playlists with one click.
🔍 Search songs by title or artist in real-time.
🌗 Light and dark mode toggle (saved in localStorage).
📱 Mobile-friendly UI with responsive sidebar menu.
🔄 Real-time toast notifications for user actions.
💾 Persistent data via localStorage (last played, playlists, etc).
🔝 Auto scroll-to-top on route change for smooth navigation.
⚡ Skeleton loading UI during fetch for better UX.
🎨 Smooth and interactive animations with Framer Motion.

title: E-commerce
about: A modern and fully responsive E-Commerce web application that allows users to browse products, filter by categories, search items, view details, and manage a shopping cart with real-time toast notifications. Built with scalability and performance in mind.
features: 🔍 Search products by keyword.
📂 Browse by product categories.
🛒 Add to cart / remove from cart functionality.
➕ Increment / decrement quantity in cart.
📄 View full product details.
🌗 Light and dark mode toggle (saved in localStorage).
🔄 Real-time toast notifications on user actions.
📱 Mobile-friendly sidebar toggle.
🔝 Auto scroll-to-top on route change.
💯 Clean and scalable folder structure.
⚡ Skeleton loading UI for better user experience during data fetch.

title: Notes App
about: This is a feature-rich note-taking application designed for quick and organized writing. You can effortlessly create new notes, pin important ones at the top, and delete or restore them when needed — all within a clean, modern, and responsive user interface.
features: 📝 Create Notes — Quickly add a title and content for each note.
📌 Pin Notes — Highlight important notes at the top.
🗑️ Trash Bin — Restore or permanently delete notes.
👁️ View Modal — Click a note to view full content in a popup.
🌙 Dark Mode — Seamlessly switch between light and dark themes.
💾 Local Storage — All notes are saved even after refresh or reload.
🌀 Press & Hold Menu — Long-press a note to access pin/edit/delete actions.
🎨 Framer Motion — Smooth animations for a modern and engaging UI.
